5.Pros: Very friendly environment, easy to learn and to make new friends. Scheduling is usually very very flexible and they let you work when you can.
5.Cons: Rude coworkers, sometimes the customers become unruly over nothing. Clientele and location sometimes determine the quality of the store and that puts a damper on things.

7.Pros: Flexible work schedules is a huge reason to work here and over time is amazing when you work closing shifts.

8.Pros: The work is simple, the hours are flexible, and they give raises every six months.
8.Cons: While simple, the work can be stressful during the food rushes throughout the day.

9.Pros: Great experience in management and business
